name: Macfastdev
tagline: Short and simple script which I create to use on my job to make all mac at office with same configuration
body:
### MacOS fast dev env installation

#### What is in

* install x-code
* install brew
* Packages 
    

    | Package name  |      Version      |
    |:-------------:|:-----------------:|
    | GIT           | @latest           |
    | PHP           | v7.0              |
    | Apache        | v4.6.1            |
    | NodeJs        | @latest from NPM  |
    | Gulp          | @latest from NPM  |
    | Bower         | v2.4              |
    | DNSMasq       | @latest           |


#### How it works
1. Clone files
2. Open terminal
3. run ` sh ./install.sh`
4. give root password

#### TODO List 
* create instalation from packages file 
* add sublime as default editor

* Add additional PHP packages for Symfony2/3
    * [ ] intl
    * [ ] x-debug
* Install front-end soft globaly:
    * [x] NodeJs
    * [x] Gulp
    * [x] Bower

* Install other development software    
    * [x] Install MySql
    * [ ] Slack
    * [ ] SequelPro
    * [ ] Chrome
    * [ ] PHPStorm maybe EAP
    * [ ] [_Alfred 3_](https://www.alfredapp.com/)
    * [ ] _Skype_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
